Control Name: REL 2.5 Enforce non-overlapping private IP address ranges in all private address spaces where they are connected
Control Statement: The IP address ranges of each of your VPCs must not overlap when peered or connected via VPN. You must similarly avoid IP address conï¬‚icts between a VPC and on-premises environments or with other cloud providers that you use. You must also have a way to allocate private IP address ranges when needed.
